titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for a general fast throughout the realm of England
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall this 22d day of March 1671/2. In the 24th year of His Majesties reign."
